name: 3 Donuts: Simple Vanilla Powdered Donut
description: An easy three ingredient spot on vanilla powdered donut recipe. I used to mix this up with Cap Glazed Donut, but since FA Zeppola came out it has definitely been my go to for a donut base. This recipe could be tinkered and made more complex, but it's delicious as is and showcases just how good of a flavor Zeppola is.
author: MrColdOne
